name: The Splatyard
description:
You're gonna have to fullscreen this one, sorry ; )

CONTROLS:

P1 > WASD (move), E (shoot).

P2 > Arrow Keys (move), Enter (shoot).

-------------------------------------------------

Ever feel like your own Garden is a warzone? Well just wait until you see what these plants are up to behind your backs!

Face off in a Garden Plant 1V1, and see who can survive the Splatyard!

Watch out, there's a Pesky 5min Round Timer for those who like to run around. Now get out there, and let's see what you can do.
